page.title: 05O.S. Area 4344-4041
page.content: In this area the A64 trunk road crosses the A1 trunk road, with the A64 underpassing the A1 and 2 slip roads servicing the A1.The rest of the section is entirely farmland with a minor access road running along the Northern section to the farmhouses. Eight families live in the five buildings which are owned by Mr. W. Illingworth. The farmland is a mixture of crops (sugar beet, turnips, wheat, barley, oats, grass) and livestock (cattle and sheep). Also, in the middle of the Northern Section in Spen Farm, the University of Leeds' Field Station and National Institute of Agricultural Botany Regional Trial Centre. In the South West section there is a Little Chef restaurant on the A64.
